title: paramind22
author: paramind22
content: Does anyone know what causes this error? Amount Exceeds Your Balance Error It doesn't say I have a lot locked in a stake, in fact, the new version of the wallet has a lot less controls.I have around 800K and cannot send any now.It's the BiblePay coin. I know this isn't the forum for it but was just looking for general feedback on this error.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Though I have no idea of what your trying to say but since is altcoin section I believe your trying to import your token so you could stake them right?Then I think you have to try import your token in another wallet maybe you don't know if is actually locked by team if the problems persist you may contact team as to know why it happens that way.Do you download the original version or fake?Please try go through it again to know, because new version can't misbehave in that manner maybe.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: It's possible that you're using a different address?1. For watching2. The other address of the coin you're storing.Could be, there has some case you are trying to spending using the address you're using for watching not using the address of your coin it's being stored. That's why, you can't spend the balance, because the address watching are there is no coin at all but you're trying to spend.And the error show up (Balance it's exceeding from the amount)

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: You must explain clearly the situation cause honestly its not clear. Its quite impossible to exceed or have inconsistencies on your staking amount unless ryzaadit says is right like you are using something just to watch the value or its inside the staking platform.Quote from: paramind22 on April 18, 2023, 11:04:22 PMI have around 800K and cannot send any now.It's the BiblePay coin. Maybe its a honeypot? Or a rug pull removed liquidity token? The name sounds sketchy and shitcoin so maintain a due diligence if using tokens like this.

comments.author: paramind22
comments.body: Trying to send to an exchange like I've done 500 times before with staking wallets."It doesn't say I have a lot locked in a stake, in fact, the new version of the wallet has a lot less controls.I have around 800K and cannot send any now."It's funny when people try to argue grammar with someone with an English composition BA.keys:Amount Exceeds Your Balance Error Staking Coin"send"common sense question about running a staking walletIf you have an experience in crypto you know its an error that comes up from time to time.Google it and you'll see examples.

comments.author: vv181
comments.body: It seems the coin is a fork of DASH, so this may be relevant.According to https://www.dash.org/forum/index.php?threads/amount-exceeds-balance-msg-when-sufficient-dash-is-present.48206/, Make sure the blockchain is synchronized. And try to use coin control.If it still does not work, the amount you are trying to send maybe does exceed the balance you have. Quote from: https://www.dash.org/forum/index.php?threads/sending-my-dash-to-another-wallet-says-i-exceeded-balance.49702/post-220249If you are trying to send out a privatesend transaction, you have two options :Option 1 : lower your number of rounds to mix (which will give you lower privacy, but could give some of your input amounts enough rounds now to get your 10.4 Dash out)Option 2 : Raise your number of rounds to mix with one extra round (hopefully this will now include all necessary input amounts, so you can get your 10.4 Dash out)Another relevant similar issue can be seen: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=APeo9UKk-BM. On the video it shown about transparent and private balances, since it is forked, your coin might also have a different term in regard to the transaction type.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Your problem is indeed a common problem in the crypto space, but if you still haven't got an answer to your problem, why don't you try asking about it in the relevant forum of this coin? Apart from the forum that this project has itself, you can also join their discord community here. Wouldn't it be better if you asked people who are also in the same scope as you? Well, I hope your problem is quickly resolved, mate.
